name: The True Arisen
description: Collected all other Dragon's Dogma trophies.

name: Getting a Head
description: Earned the approval of the Enlistment Corps.

name: Writ Large
description: Received a writ from the castle.

name: Come Courting
description: Attend an audience with the Duke.

name: Treacherous
description: Peered into the very depths of the world.

name: Solitude
description: Obtained the almighty power of sovereignty

name: Closure
description: Put an end to all things.

name: The Hero
description: Completed all pre-planned, non-notice board quests.

name: The Specialist
description: Learned all the skills of a single vocation.

name: Serpents' Bane
description: Defeated a drake, wyrm and wyvern.

name: Local Recruit
description: Directly enlist a pawn to your party.

name: Foreign Recruit
description: Enlisted a pawn to your party from beyond the rift.

name: The Ever-Turning Wheel
description: Completed the adventure a second time.

name: Hardened Veteran
description: Completed the game in hard mode.

name: True Conqueror
description: Defeated Daimon in his true form.
